content.d: Lanzhu, what are you glaring at on your smartphone screen?
I’m waiting.
Waiting?
Kanata-chan’s waiting, too~!
Whoa! Don’t surprise me like that, Kanata!
Ehehe, sorry~
So, what are we waiting for?
Everyone’s reactions~𝅘𝅥𝅮
Ahhh!! Come on! Don’t scare me like that, Emma... Wait, everyone’s here!
Busted. Ai-san wanted to surprise Miachi too.
Darn it.
You noticed us faster than expected.
We should’ve planned better.
Hey! Why am I the only one who doesn’t know anything?!
Geez, Miako, you’re always cooped up in your room. You don’t even know what today is, do you?
Mia-chan, here, a calendar.
A calendar...? Ah!!!
Seems like you finally realized.
Today is the release date of our new song, Mia-san!!
I see... That’s what you mean by waiting...
That’s right! We’re waiting for everyone who listened to post their thoughts!
Ah, everyone! Look at this!!
Wait, wait, let me see too~~~~!!!
